content:
TITLE: CloudBeaver Command Line Configuration Parameters
DESCRIPTION: Command line parameters for configuring the CloudBeaver server, including setting configuration file path, locale, Java VM path, and JVM parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/server/features/io.cloudbeaver.product.ce.feature/root/readme.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
-web-config <conf-file>
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
-nl locale
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
-vm <java vm path>
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
-vmargs <jvm parameters>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running CloudBeaver in Development Mode
DESCRIPTION: This command starts the CloudBeaver project in development mode. It should be run from the default product package directory, allowing for live updates and debugging during development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/webapp/readme.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
cd packages/product-default
yarn run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running CloudBeaver Server Script
DESCRIPTION: Execute this script in the root directory to start the CloudBeaver server after configuring the init-data.conf file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/server/features/io.cloudbeaver.product.ce.feature/root/readme.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
run-server.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for CloudBeaver Project using Yarn
DESCRIPTION: This command installs all the necessary dependencies for the CloudBeaver project using Yarn package manager. It should be run in the root directory of the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/webapp/readme.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
yarn
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building CloudBeaver Default Product Package
DESCRIPTION: These commands navigate to the default product package directory and run the bundle script to build the project. After building, the resulting files can be found in the 'lib' directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/webapp/readme.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
cd packages/product-default
yarn run bundle
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Executing H2 Query Executor JAR Command
DESCRIPTION: Example command showing how to run the H2 Query Executor with database path, user credentials, and a custom SQL query. Demonstrates the usage of command-line arguments for database connection and query execution.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/apps/h2-query-executor/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
java -jar h2-query-executor-1.0.0.jar --db-path=/var/cloudbeaver/workspace/.data/cb.h2.dat.mv.db --db-user=cb-data --db-password-path=/var/cloudbeaver/workspace/.data/.database-credentials.dat --db-custom-query="show tables"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Fixing TypeScript Server Crashes in PnP Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Code modification to resolve TypeScript server crashes by adjusting the API paths validation condition in .pnp.cjs file. Changes the equality check to allow for multiple API paths.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/vscode-java-configs/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
bestCandidate.apiPaths.length > 0
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Custom Class to Button Component in DBeaver UI Kit
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to add a custom CSS class to a Button component. This demonstrates how to use the className prop for additional customization.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/common-react/@dbeaver/ui-kit/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: jsx
CODE:
```
<Button className="my-custom-button">Button</Button>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Applying Inline Styles to Button Component in DBeaver UI Kit
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to apply inline styles to a Button component. This shows how to use the style prop for direct style manipulation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/common-react/@dbeaver/ui-kit/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: jsx
CODE:
```
<Button style={{ background: 'red' }}>Button</Button>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Ladle for DBeaver UI Kit Component Development
DESCRIPTION: Command to start Ladle for developing and testing React components in isolation. This allows developers to interact with components in a sandbox environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/common-react/@dbeaver/ui-kit/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn docs
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Customizing Input Component CSS in DBeaver UI Kit
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to customize the Input component using its default CSS class. This follows the same naming convention as other components in the DBeaver UI Kit.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/common-react/@dbeaver/ui-kit/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: css
CODE:
```
.dbv-kit-input {
  /* Your custom styles */
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Customizing Button Component CSS in DBeaver UI Kit
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to customize the Button component using its default CSS class. This demonstrates the naming convention for component CSS classes in the DBeaver UI Kit.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/common-react/@dbeaver/ui-kit/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: css
CODE:
```
.dbv-kit-button {
  /* Your custom styles */
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Module Name Definition in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: A markdown heading defining the name of the npm module for result set API in DBeaver.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/common-typescript/@dbeaver/result-set-api/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# @dbeaver/result-set-api
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: DBeaver Database Commons Package Name
DESCRIPTION: The package name declaration for the DBeaver database commons module
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/common-typescript/@dbeaver/database-commons/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# @dbeaver/database-commons
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Common React Library Title
DESCRIPTION: Markdown header indicating the common React components library for the CloudBeaver project
SOURCE: https://github.com/dbeaver/cloudbeaver/blob/devel/common-react/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# common-react
```
